issues.title: [DESIGN] Full Homepage Redesign - Modern Full-Width Layout
issues.body:
## Problem

Current homepage uses traditional two-column layout. Full redesign needed for modern, bold, full-width aesthetic.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - First impression and credibility
- Modernizes outdated design
- Better portfolio showcase

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Homepage template full-width layout
- [ ] Sidebar removed
- [ ] Hero section implemented
- [ ] Work showcase grid
- [ ] Mobile responsive 320px-1440px+
- [ ] Page load < 3 seconds
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
- [ ] Tested with screen readers

issues.title: [DESIGN] Create Modern Component Library
issues.body:
## Problem

No unified component system. Building with ad-hoc components creates inconsistency.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Foundation for redesign
- Enables consistent implementation

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] 20+ components created
- [ ] All WCAG 2.1 AA compliant
- [ ] Design tokens defined
- [ ] BEM naming applied
- [ ] Component guide complete
- [ ] Responsive variants
- [ ] Hover/focus/active states

issues.title: [DESIGN] Typography System Update
issues.body:
## Problem

Typography relies on size variation only. No explicit weights, reducing hierarchy and accessibility.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM-HIGH** - Weak visual hierarchy
- CTAs don't stand out

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Font weights defined (400, 600, 700)
- [ ] Type scale defined (H1-H6)
- [ ] Line heights optimized
- [ ] Spacing system established
- [ ] Responsive typography
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA contrast verified

issues.title: [DESIGN] Color Palette Refinement
issues.body:
## Problem

No defined color system. Colors chosen ad-hoc, creating accessibility issues.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM-HIGH** - Brand identity weak
- Accessibility compliance uncertain

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Primary, secondary, accent colors selected
- [ ] Neutral palette (5+ shades)
- [ ] Semantic colors (success, warning, error)
- [ ] All combinations tested for WCAG AA contrast
- [ ] CSS variables created
- [ ] Usage guidelines documented

issues.title: [DESIGN] Navigation Redesign - Modern Mobile-First
issues.body:
## Problem

Navigation needs modern, mobile-first redesign with accessibility focus.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Navigation is critical UX
- Mobile experience must be excellent

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Desktop navigation redesigned
- [ ] Mobile menu (hamburger) implemented
- [ ] Smooth animations
- [ ] Active page highlighted
- [ ] Focus indicators visible
- [ ] Keyboard navigation functional
- [ ] Screen reader compatible
- [ ] Touch targets 48px+
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

issues.title: [DESIGN] Footer Redesign
issues.body:
## Problem

Footer lacks visual appeal and doesn't guide users to important content.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM-HIGH** - Important navigational element
- Trust building opportunity

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Footer with 4-5 sections
- [ ] Dark background with proper contrast
- [ ] All important links (privacy, terms, etc.)
- [ ] Newsletter signup form
- [ ] Social links visible
- [ ] Mobile responsive
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

issues.title: [DESIGN] Photography Showcase Component
issues.body:
## Problem

Need dedicated component for photography portfolio as credential.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Photography differentiator
- Visual assets not leveraged

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Gallery component created
- [ ] Images lazy load < 2 seconds
- [ ] Grid layout responsive
- [ ] Optional lightbox/modal
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
- [ ] Alt text on all images
- [ ] Photography positioned as credential

issues.title: [DESIGN] Project Card Design Pattern
issues.body:
## Problem

Three major projects need consistent card design (BC+AI, Indigenomics, The Upgrade AI).

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Project cards are core structure
- Inconsistency reduces professionalism

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Card design system documented
- [ ] 3 project cards with identical structure
- [ ] Images optimized
- [ ] Mobile: Cards stack vertically
- [ ] Desktop: Cards in row
- [ ] Hover states defined
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

issues.title: [DESIGN] Form Design Updates
issues.body:
## Problem

Forms need modern redesign with accessibility improvements.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Forms are conversion points
- Accessibility violations present

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Form component system created
- [ ] All inputs have visible labels
- [ ] Error messages clear
- [ ] Success confirmation prominent
- [ ] Mobile: Full-width, large touch targets
- [ ] Keyboard navigation functional
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

issues.title: [DESIGN] Mobile-First Responsive System
issues.body:
## Problem

Mobile-first approach mandatory. Responsive breakpoints and touch-friendly design required.

## Impact

- **CRITICAL** - Mobile-first non-negotiable
- 60%+ users on mobile

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Breakpoints defined (320px, 768px, 1024px, 1440px)
- [ ] Mobile-first CSS
- [ ] Typography scales fluidly
- [ ] Touch targets 48px minimum
- [ ] Images load appropriately per device
- [ ] Lighthouse mobile score > 85
- [ ] No horizontal scrolling

issues.title: [DESIGN] Hero Section Visual Treatment
issues.body:
## Problem

Hero must communicate polymath positioning effectively.

## Impact

- **CRITICAL** - First impression
- Sets tone for site

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Hero full viewport width
- [ ] Headline states value/expertise
- [ ] Subheading reinforces positioning
- [ ] Hero image optimized < 2s mobile
- [ ] Text overlays readable (contrast)
- [ ] Primary CTA prominent
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance

issues.title: [DESIGN] CTA Button Design System
issues.body:
## Problem

CTA buttons need unified design with clear hierarchy and states.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - CTAs drive conversions
- Inconsistency reduces professionalism

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Button system documented
- [ ] Primary, secondary, tertiary styles
- [ ] Hover, active, disabled states
- [ ] Minimum 48px height
- [ ] Icons supported
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA contrast
- [ ] Keyboard focus visible

issues.title: [SEO] Add Unique Meta Descriptions
issues.body:
## Problem

Pages lack unique meta descriptions. Critical SEO factor for CTR.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM-HIGH** - Direct SEO impact
- 40-60% lower CTR without descriptions

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All pages have unique descriptions
- [ ] 150-160 characters each
- [ ] Keywords naturally integrated
- [ ] Search Console shows correct rendering
- [ ] Guidelines documented

issues.title: [SEO] Create XML Sitemap
issues.body:
## Problem

No XML sitemap at /sitemap.xml. Critical SEO requirement.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM-HIGH** - SEO degraded
- Slower indexing
- Some pages may not appear in search

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] /sitemap.xml returns valid XML
- [ ] All public pages included
- [ ] robots.txt references sitemap
- [ ] Submitted to Google Search Console
- [ ] Submitted to Bing Webmaster
- [ ] Auto-updates with new content

issues.title: [SEO] Implement Internal Linking Strategy
issues.body:
## Problem

Internal linking weak and inconsistent. Undermines SEO and navigation.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Affects rankings and user navigation
- Deep pages don't rank well

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All pages have 2-5 internal links
- [ ] Important pages have 5+ links
- [ ] No orphaned pages
- [ ] All pages reachable within 3 clicks
- [ ] Anchor text descriptive
- [ ] Related content cross-linked
- [ ] Session duration increased

issues.title: [SEO] Add Schema Markup (Person, Organization, Article)
issues.body:
## Problem

No structured data/schema markup. Reduces rich snippet eligibility.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Missed rich snippets
- No knowledge graph visibility

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Organization schema added (BC+AI, Indigenomics, The Upgrade AI)
- [ ] Person schema for Kris Krug
- [ ] Article schema on all blog posts
- [ ] BreadcrumbList on multi-level pages
- [ ] Schema validates without errors
- [ ] Rich snippets begin appearing

issues.title: [SEO] Optimize Images for Performance and SEO
issues.body:
## Problem

Images not optimized. Large file sizes, missing metadata.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM-HIGH** - Performance and SEO impact
- Slow page loads
- Poor mobile experience

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All images optimized and compressed
- [ ] File sizes < 150KB average (WebP)
- [ ] 100% alt text coverage
- [ ] WebP with fallbacks
- [ ] Lazy loading enabled
- [ ] Responsive images (srcset)
- [ ] Core Web Vitals green

issues.title: [PERFORMANCE] Reduce Plugin Bloat
issues.body:
## Problem

Site heavily plugin-dependent (Jetpack, PopupMaker, etc.), creating performance bloat.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Page load > 3 seconds
- Mobile performance degraded
- SEO ranking penalties

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Plugin audit completed
- [ ] 3+ plugins removed/replaced
- [ ] Performance improved 20%+
- [ ] Page load < 2.5s
- [ ] Mobile PageSpeed ≥ 85
- [ ] Desktop PageSpeed ≥ 90

issues.title: [PERFORMANCE] Implement Lazy Loading for Images
issues.body:
## Problem

Images load synchronously, blocking page rendering.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Performance degraded
- Mobile users experience slow renders

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Lazy loading on all images
- [ ] Native HTML loading="lazy" used
- [ ] Placeholder effect visible
- [ ] LCP improved 30%+
- [ ] CLS score < 0.1
- [ ] Tested on 3G network

issues.title: [SEO] Add Twitter Card Tags
issues.body:
## Problem

No Twitter Card meta tags despite active presence. Shares show minimal preview.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Social sharing not optimized
- Reduced engagement

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Twitter Card tags on all pages
- [ ] Validated with Twitter Card Validator
- [ ] Images 1200x630px
- [ ] Site handle included
- [ ] Tested across article types

issues.title: [CONTENT] Create Glossary Page for AI Terminology
issues.body:
## Problem

AI and Indigenous terminology used without definitions. Creates barriers for newcomers.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM-HIGH** - Exclusionary for newcomers
- Jargon creates accessibility barrier

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Glossary page at /glossary
- [ ] 50+ terms defined
- [ ] Alphabetically organized
- [ ] Searchable
- [ ] Links from main content
- [ ] Mobile responsive
- [ ] SEO optimized

issues.title: [SEO] Add RSS Feeds for Blog Categories
issues.body:
## Problem

No category-specific RSS feeds. Users can't subscribe to specific topics.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Reduced content distribution
- Topic-specific audiences can't filter

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Category RSS feeds created
- [ ] Feed URLs follow pattern
- [ ] All feeds include proper metadata
- [ ] Tested in major readers
- [ ] Feed discovery links visible
- [ ] Promoted in newsletter

issues.title: [A11Y] Full WCAG 2.1 AA Accessibility Audit
issues.body:
## Problem

Site lacks comprehensive WCAG 2.1 AA compliance audit and systematic remediation plan.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Legal compliance risk
- Excludes users with disabilities
- Mission misalignment

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Audit covers 100% of public pages
- [ ] All WCAG 2.1 AA criteria evaluated
- [ ] Automated + manual testing complete
- [ ] Critical issues prioritized
- [ ] Remediation roadmap created
- [ ] Report deliverables complete
- [ ] Audit by accessibility specialist

issues.title: [A11Y] Keyboard Navigation Improvements
issues.body:
## Problem

Comprehensive keyboard navigation incomplete. Many components lack proper support.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Users unable to navigate keyboard-only
- Blocks motor disability users
- WCAG 2.1 AA violation

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] 100% interactive elements keyboard accessible
- [ ] Tab order logical
- [ ] Focus always visible
- [ ] No keyboard traps
- [ ] Modal focus management
- [ ] Skip links functional
- [ ] Forms keyboard navigable
- [ ] Screen reader compatible

issues.title: [A11Y] Create Accessibility Statement
issues.body:
## Problem

No published Accessibility Statement. Legal risk and transparency gap.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Legal compliance concern
- Users don't know what's accessible
- No reporting process

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Statement published at /accessibility
- [ ] Current status documented
- [ ] Known issues listed transparently
- [ ] Reporting mechanism clear
- [ ] Accommodation process documented
- [ ] Roadmap included
- [ ] Linked from footer
- [ ] Page itself WCAG 2.1 AAA accessible
